name: Nevinyrral, Urborg Tyrant
oracle_text:
Hexproof from artifacts, creatures, and enchantments
When Nevinyrral, Urborg Tyrant enters the battlefield, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each creature that died this turn.
When Nevinyrral dies, you may pay {1}. When you do, destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

name: "Rat King of Llanowar"
oracle_text:
Vigilance, menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
"Rat King of Llanowar"'s power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control plus the number of Elf cards in your graveyard.

name: "Rat King of Llanowar"
oracle_text:
Vigilance, menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
"Rat King of Llanowar"'s power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control plus the number of Elf cards in your graveyard.

name: Reclamation Sage
oracle_text: When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "What was once formed by masons, shaped by smiths, or given life by mages, I will return to the embrace of the earth."

name: Eyeblight Massacre
oracle_text: Non-Elf creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I've already seen so much evil, so much darkness. Why do you insist on adding more?"
—Nissa Revane, to Dwynen

name: Wildheart Invoker
oracle_text: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: "Juri, Master of the Revue"
oracle_text:
Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Juri, Master of the Revue.
When "Juri, Master of the Revue" dies, it deals damage to any target equal to its power.

name: "Flamekin Herald"
oracle_text: Commander spells you control have cascade. (When you cast your commander, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Spark Harvest
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}{B}.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: With the harvest of Domri's spark, the Elderspell began to fuel Bolas's ascension to godhood.

name: Araumi of the Dead Tide
oracle_text: {T}, Exile cards from your graveyard equal to the number of opponents you have: Target creature card in your graveyard gains encore until end of turn. The encore cost is equal to its mana cost. (Exile the creature card and pay its mana cost: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

name: Araumi of the Dead Tide
oracle_text: {T}, Exile cards from your graveyard equal to the number of opponents you have: Target creature card in your graveyard gains encore until end of turn. The encore cost is equal to its mana cost. (Exile the creature card and pay its mana cost: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

name: Crow of Dark Tidings
oracle_text:
Flying
When Crow of Dark Tidings enters the battlefield or dies, mill two cards.
flavor_text:
"Well, this can't be a good sign."
—Old Rutstein

name: Deranged Assistant
oracle_text: {T}, Mill a card: Add {C}.
flavor_text: "Garl, adjust the slurry dispensers. Garl, fetch more corpses. Garl, quit crying and give me your brain tissue. If he doesn't stop being so rude, I'm quitting."

name: Ghastly Demise
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature if its toughness is less than or equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Anyone can snap her fingers and yank a soul. I prefer to kill creatively."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Commander's Plate
Sifter Wurm
oracle_text:
Trample
When Sifter Wurm enters the battlefield, scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost.
flavor_text:
"Rhonas's monument belongs to the wurms now. Look elsewhere for refuge."
—Arnun, vizier of the menagerie

name: Faith's Fetters
oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

name: Lathiel, the Bounteous Dawn
oracle_text:
Lifelink
At the beginning of each end step, if you gained life this turn, distribute up to that many +1/+1 counters among any number of other target creatures.
flavor_text: Weeping, the hunter cast aside her bow, struck by the majesty of the creature before her.

name: Lathiel, the Bounteous Dawn
oracle_text:

name: Tana, the Bloodsower
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever Tana, the Bloodsower deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
